title: Barbapapa Sekai wo Mawaru (Barbapapa Around the World)
synopsis: Barbapapa around the world, is a fun-filled collection of 5-minute animated cartoons for preschool children. Barbapapa and his family return to TV for the first time in 25 years with 50 completely new and original episodes.
staff: [['Kagawa, Yutaka', ['Episode Director']], ['Yamada, Michishiro', ['Episode Director', ' Key Animation', ' Animation Director']], ['Seki, Shuuichi', ['Key Animation', ' Animation Director']], ['Ikeda, Yuuji', ['Art Director']]]
